verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H2720>dry<s%> <S%H6595>morsel,<s%> and <S%H7962>quietness<s%> therewith, than an <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> with <S%H7379>strife.<s%>

The <S%H4715>fining<s%> <S%H4715>pot<s%> is for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> for <S%H2091>gold:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H974>tries<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts.<s%>
A <S%H7489>wicked<s%> doer gives <S%H7181>heed<s%> to <S%H205>false<s%> <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and a <S%H8267>liar<s%> gives <S%H238>ear<s%> to a <S%H1942>naughty<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
Whoever <S%H3932>mocks<s%> the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker:<s%> and he that is <S%H8056>glad<s%> at <S%H343>calamities<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
<S%H1121>Children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> are the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H2205>old<s%> men; and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of <S%H1121>children<s%> are their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
<S%H3499>Excellent<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> <S%H5000>becomes<s%> not a <S%H5036>fool:<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> less do <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> a <S%H5081>prince.<s%>
A <S%H7810>gift<s%> is as a <S%H2580>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of him that <S%H1167>has<s%> it: <S%H413>wherever<s%> it <S%H6437>turns,<s%> it <S%H7919>prospers.<s%>
He that <S%H3680>covers<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H160>love;<s%> but he that <S%H8138>repeats<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H6504>separates<s%> very <S%H441>friends.<s%>
A <S%H1606>reproof<s%> <S%H5181>enters<s%> more into a <S%H995>wise<s%> man than an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5221>stripes<s%> into a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
An <S%H7451>evil<s%> man <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H4805>rebellion:<s%> therefore a <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> shall be <S%H7971>sent<s%> against him.
Let a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H7909>robbed<s%> of her whelps <S%H6298>meet<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H408>rather<s%> than a <S%H3684>fool<s%> in his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
Whoever <S%H7725>rewards<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H4066>strife<s%> is as when one <S%H6362>lets<s%> out <S%H4325>water:<s%> therefore <S%H5203>leave<s%> off <S%H7379>contention,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it be <S%H1566>meddled<s%> with.

He that <S%H6663>justifies<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he that <S%H7561>condemns<s%> the <S%H6662>just,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> they <S%H8147>both<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is there a <S%H4242>price<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> seeing he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to it?
A <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times,<s%> and a <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> for <S%H6869>adversity.<s%>

A <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%> <S%H8628>strikes<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H6148>becomes<s%> <S%H6161>surety<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
He <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> that <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4683>strife:<s%> and he that <S%H1361>exalts<s%> his <S%H6607>gate<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

He that has a <S%H6141>fraudulent<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good:<s%> and he that has a <S%H2015>perverse<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H7451>mischief.<s%>
He that <S%H3205>begets<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> does it to his <S%H8424>sorrow:<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of a <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8056>joy.<s%>
A <S%H8056>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> does <S%H3190>good<s%> like a <S%H1456>medicine:<s%> but a <S%H5218>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> the <S%H1634>bones.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H7810>gift<s%> out of the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> to <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him that has <S%H995>understanding;<s%> but the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> are in the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is a <S%H3708>grief<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H4470>bitterness<s%> to her that <S%H3205>bore<s%> him.
<S%H1571>Also<s%> to <S%H6064>punish<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%> is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> nor to <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5081>princes<s%> for <S%H3476>equity.<s%>
He that has <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H2820>spares<s%> his <S%H561>words:<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is of an <S%H7119>excellent<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> a <S%H191>fool,<s%> when he <S%H2790>holds<s%> his <S%H2790>peace,<s%> is <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H2450>wise:<s%> and he that <S%H331>shuts<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> is esteemed a man of <S%H995>understanding.<s%>
